attributes.label: Dexterity
attributes.description: Agility and reflexes. Determines consumable slots.

attributes.label: Constitution
attributes.description: Physical Endurance. Affects Hit Points, Radioactive Control, and Death Save Dice.

attributes.label: Intelligence
attributes.description: Mental Acuity. Affects maximum number of Experiences, and die rerolls on Saves.

attributes.label: Perception
attributes.description: Awareness of the world and self. Affects dice rerolls on attacks and skill rolls..
